**Support**

You always have a way of getting help. Whether its LiveChat, Ticket, Phone, Email, Discord, Whatsapp, or even Skype. We also have routine checkups to ensure you are happy with your server!

**Control Panel**

We provide a secure, fast, smooth, and easy to use control panel with every dedicated server. Here are the key features of our control panel:

Bandwidth usage graphs
